DOC.brief_summary: The exact incidence of optic disc swelling and idiopathic intracranial hypertension in patients using antiacne medication is not known so far. The investigators hypothesize that swelling of retinal nerve fibre layer measured by optical coherence tomography is more frequent then assumed so far.
DOC.detailed_description: Measurement of retinal nerve fibre layer using optical coherence tomography over a period of 6 to 9 months depending on exact antiacne medication.
DOC.criteria: Antiacne medication treatment indicated by dermatologist age > 18 years contraception if indicated age < 18 years
